name: The A983's World Movie Game
description:
A983's World is a obscure Youtube Series about a simpluman named A983, a Robot called Evan, a dragon called Drago, and the other people in Scratchland. Evil A983 is the villain of the show. This game is the "Spongebob Movie Game" Of A983's World.

Gameplay

Once you've completed the 0th boss, what now?
Well, save the world! Use the Fast Travel Feature to seamlessly shift through levels. Fight Dark Drago, Dark Harold, Dark A983, Lefty Sonic, Dark Evan & Evil A983 respectively in these worlds: Forest, Sea, Temple, Sonic's Hero Pizza Palace, and Evil A983's Lair. On the Trading City, there's Nurse Clone Amy, who will heal your wounds after a battle, then there's the items shop, where you buy or sell items like Fried Rock Skins, Leaf Jerky, Monster Scratchy Patties, Scratch-Chips, and many more.
Go on and save the world!
